name: ¿Rat King?
description: Deep underground, far from human civilisation resides the Rat King in his colosseum. In order to satiate his boredom, the king has decided to host a gladiator-style tournament for the beetle people of his kingdom. You must compete against another beetle to survive in a battle to the end in order to win the favour of the crowd and the King himself. Use all the tools given to you to your advantage, and persevere through all obstacles thrown at you by the spectators.
